popover.title: Job Status Panel üìä
popover.description: Current status of your job: Queued (waiting in line), Running (actively processing), Completed (results ready), or Failed (check logs for errors). Also shows job ID, submission time, and duration.

popover.title: Live Analysis Logs
popover.description: Watch real-time output from the gRINN analysis. Logs auto-scroll as new messages arrive. For running jobs, you'll see which analysis step is currently executing. Error messages appear here if something goes wrong.

popover.title: Manual Refresh
popover.description: The page auto-refreshes every 3 seconds while your job is running. Click here for an immediate refresh if you want to check status right away.

popover.title: Interactive Dashboard üçÄ
popover.description: When your job completes, click here to launch the gRINN Dashboard! Explore your results with interactive heatmaps, network graphs, 3D molecular visualization, and an AI-powered chatbot for data analysis.

popover.title: Download Results
popover.description: Download all results as a compressed archive for offline analysis, backup, or use with other tools. Includes interaction energy matrices, network metrics, and precomputed visualizations.

popover.title: View All Jobs
popover.description: Click here to see all your submitted jobs in the queue. You can monitor multiple jobs simultaneously and compare results.
